name: Xylos
overview: Xylos is an action-adventure game where the player lands with their ship on a foreign planet and has to collect all scattered disks there. The inhabitants are hostile and will damage the player but if the player has a higher strength than the opponent then the player will win the fight and the opponent will be killed for good. Combat is fairly simple. All the player has to do is walk into an enemy to kill it. The player can refill their energy by collecting it.
